#!/bin/bash
#lesslinux provides gtk3theme #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
case $1 in start) printf "$bold===> Copy Adwaita theme for root $normal\n" mkdir -p /root/.config tar -C /usr/share/themes/Adwaita -cvf - gtk-3.0 gtk-2.0 | tar -C /root/.config -xf - ;; esac

#!/static/bin/ash
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin:/opt/bin:/opt/sbin
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors . /etc/lesslinux/branding/branding.en.sh
for i in /etc/xinitrc.d/[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-*.?? ; do provides="` cat $i | grep '#lesslinux provides' | awk '{print $3}' `" if echo "$skipservices" | grep -q '|'$provides'|' ; then echo "Skipping $provides" else $i start fi done
# Set DPI value if [ -f /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb ] ; then xrdb -merge /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb xrdb -merge /home/surfer/.lesslinux/urxvt.xrdb else mkdir -p /home/surfer/.lesslinux echo "Xft.dpi: ${dpi}" >> /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb xrdb -merge /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb
cat >> /home/surfer/.lesslinux/urxvt.xrdb << "EOF" URxvt*perl-ext: matcher URxvt*urlLauncher: firefox URxvt.background: black URxvt.foreground: white URxvt*font: xft:Fixed:pixelsize=14 EOF
xrdb -merge /home/surfer/.lesslinux/urxvt.xrdb fi
for f in .config/cairo-dock/current_theme/launchers/05launcher.desktop Desktop/000_mmmm.desktop .config/openbox/menu.xml ; do sed -i 's/mmmm\.rb/mmmmng.sh/g' /home/surfer/${f} done
# Uncomment to debug # /usr/bin/Terminal & # /usr/bin/xterm & # setxkbmap -rules xorg -model pc105 -layout "$xkbmap" xfsettingsd --replace setxkbmap -layout "$xkbmap" esetroot -scale /etc/lesslinux/branding/desktop.jpg Thunar --daemon & if xdpyinfo | grep -q -i composite ; then sed -i 's/fake transparency=true/fake transparency=false/g' $HOME/.config/cairo-dock/current_theme/cairo-dock.conf fi sed -i 's/modules=switcher;/modules=/g' $HOME/.config/cairo-dock/current_theme/cairo-dock.conf xbindkeys & cairo-dock -c & if xdpyinfo | grep -q -i composite ; then sleep 1 compton --shadow-exclude '_GTK_FRAME_EXTENTS@:c' --fade-exclude '_GTK_FRAME_EXTENTS@:c' -cCGbf # xcompmgr -c & fi openbox & conky -d # Weird hack! xfct=0 while true ; do sleep 5 if [ "$xfct" -lt 3 ] ; then killall -9 compton xfsettingsd --replace compton --shadow-exclude '_GTK_FRAME_EXTENTS@:c' --fade-exclude '_GTK_FRAME_EXTENTS@:c' -cCGbf xfct=` expr $xfct + 1 ` sleep 5 else sleep 9999999 fi done
